alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 31 at 7:36PM CST until February 02 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Mermentau River Near Mermentau Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Minor flooding begins along the bayou with a few structures right along the bayou threatened. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 17.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:15 PM CST Tuesday was 17.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow evening and continue falling to 5.7 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Bayou Des Cannes Eunice 16.0 17.3 Tue 6 pm CST 16.0 12.9 10.3 &&
